# apptrust_application_version_promotions (Data Source)

Returns the list of promotions for a specific application version (GET /v1/applications/{application_key}/versions/{version}/promotions).

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "apptrust_application_version_promotions" "example" {
  application_key = "my-web-app"
  version         = "1.0.0"
}

output "promotions" {
  value = data.apptrust_application_version_promotions.example.promotions
}

output "total" {
  value = data.apptrust_application_version_promotions.example.total
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `application_key` (String) The application key.
- `version` (String) The application version.

### Optional

- `filter_by` (String) Filter by application_version, target_stage, promoted_by, or status (success, pending, failed).
- `include` (String) When set to message, returns any error messages from the promotion operation.
- `limit` (Number) Maximum number of promotions to return.
- `offset` (Number) Number of records to skip (pagination).
- `order_asc` (Boolean) Sort ascending (true) or descending (false). Default false.
- `order_by` (String) Order by: created, created_by, version, stage. Default is created.

### Read-Only

- `promotions` (List of Object) List of promotion records. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--promotions))
- `total` (Number) Total number of promotions.

<a id="nestedatt--promotions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `promotions`

Read-Only:

- `application_key` (String)
- `application_version` (String)
- `created` (String)
- `created_by` (String)
- `created_millis` (Number)
- `messages` (List of String)
- `project_key` (String)
- `source_stage` (String)
- `status` (String)
- `target_stage` (String)
